Is Finnish an official language of the European Union?	Yes
Is Finnish an official language of the European Union?	Yes
Is Finnish an official language of the European Union?	Yes, Finnish is an official language of the European Union.
Are the dialects of Finnish divided into two groups?	Yes
Are the dialects of Finnish divided into two groups?	Yes, the dialects of Finnish are divided into two groups.
Is Finnish threatened by English?	No
Is Finnish threatened by English?	No, Finnish is not threatened by English.
When did Proto-Uralic language arrive in Finland?	Around 1900 BCE
When did Proto-Uralic language arrive in Finland?	Proto-Uralic language arrived in Finland around 1900 BCE.
What are characteristic features of Finnish?	Vowel harmony and an agglutinative morphology
What are characteristic features of Finnish?	Characteristic features of Finnish are vowel harmony and an agglutinative morphology.
Where is the Kven language spoken?	Norway
Where is the Kven language spoken?	The Kven language is spoken in Northern Norway.
For how long has the classification of dialects spoken outside of Finland been a controversial issue?	Since Finland's independence in 1917
For how long has the classification of dialects spoken outside of Finland been a controversial issue?	The classification of dialects spoken outside of Finland has been a controversial issue since Finland's independence in 1917.
Who wrote the first novel in Finnish?	Aleksis Kivi
Who wrote the first novel in Finnish?	The first novel in Finnish was published by Aleksis Kivi.
What book defined the official Finnish language?	The Dictionary of Contemporary Finnish
What book defined the official Finnish language?	The Dictionary of Contemporary Finnish defined the official Finnish language.
